Intro.paragraph: 8bit Emojis are a limited collection of 10,000 uniquely generated NFT's from over 100 different attributes. The 1st generation of 10,000 NFT's will be 24 x 24 pixels, enlarged to 600 x 600 pixels and stored on the Ethereum Blockchain.
Intro.secondP: Each 8bit Emoji will cost 0.043 ETH and you will be able to mint 10 per transaction.

About.paragraph: NFT's are not just digital art ownership, we believe they should be bought everywhere.  Each month in the discord, we will be nominating an 8bit Emoji of the month and will have special merchandise for each one.  Join our Discord and become part of our community.

Services.name: Discord
Services.text: Are you an 8bit-emoji fanatic!?!?  Join the discussion in our discord channel.
